FuncDef: The display pppoe statistics online-fail-record command displays statistics about PPPoE user login failures on a specified board because the maximum number of IP addresses configured for the board has been exceeded.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays statistics about PPPoE user login failures on the board in a specified slot.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When processing PADI or PADR packets sent by PPPoE users, the BRAS verifies the number of login PPPoE users on a board against that configured using the access-ip-limit command. If the number of login PPPoE users exceeds the specified upper limit, the system rejects new PPPoE user requests and records the statistics about such access failures. To check login failure statistics due to access IP limit(maximum number of access users), run the display pppoe statistics online-fail-record command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
